fieldsSummary.name: fieldsSummary
fieldsSummary.description: Calculates the cardinality of field values that the specified fields have.

parameters.name: topValues
parameters.description: The number of top N values to be returned. The default value is `20`.

parameters.name: extrapolateSamples
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the cardinality shall be multiplied with a possible sampling rate.

makeTimeseries.name: makeTimeseries
makeTimeseries.description: Creates timeseries from the data in the stream.
syntax: makeTimeseries [by: { [expression, …] }] [, interval] [, bins] [, from] [, to] [, timeframe] [, time ,] [, spread ,] [, nonempty ,] [, scalar:] aggregation, …

parameters.name: aggregation
parameters.description:
The aggregation function that should be used to create the series.
Input values in the aggregation function need to be numeric.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The expression that provides the timestamp for a record, which will be assigned to a series bucket.

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: The timeframe of the series. The actual series timeframe will be adjusted by the series alignment. The default value is query timeframe.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start timestamp of the series. The actual series timeframe will be adjusted by the series alignment.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end timestamp of the series. The actual series timeframe will be adjusted by the series alignment.

parameters.name: nonempty
parameters.description: Produces empty series when there is no data.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The length of a bucket in the series. Must not be specified if bins is specified. Automatically calculated based on the number of bins.

parameters.name: bins
parameters.description: The number of buckets that should be created for the series. Must not be specified if `interval` is specified. The default value is `120`.

parameters.name: spread
parameters.description: A timeframe expression that provides the timeframe for the bucket calculation of the values in the series. Spread can only be used instead of time and you can only use it with the count or countIf functions.

parameters.name: scalar
parameters.description: Flag to indicate that a single scalar value spanning the whole timeframe shall be calculated. Can be used on any aggregation function except start and end.

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: The expressions the series should be split by.

summarize.name: summarize
summarize.description: Groups together records that have the same values for a given field and aggregates them.

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: The fields definition that will be used to group records.
